body.name: CRUA 22 Inch White Monitor, FHD 1080P 95% sRGB 75Hz Computer Monitor Support Low Blue Light, Tilt Adjustment, Wall Mount Install. Desktop PC Display for Office or Gaming(HDMI/VGA Ports)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 21 mins
features: 【22-inch White Monitor】22'' Full HD (1920X1080P) monitor uses a VA panel, up to 75 Hz, and an aspect ratio of 16:9, providing faster and smoother image changes than standard, reducing screen tearing. Perfectly suitable for various purposes, including business, office work, studying, movies, and gaming.

【Immersive Visuals】PC monitors feature 95% sRGB, 8-bit, and 16.7 million colors, delivering a wider color gamut, deeper colors, and sharper features. Coupled with the VA panel, the 3000:1 contrast ratio produces brighter whites and deeper blacks for realistic images. Enjoy movies, shows, and videos where every frame is lifelike, vividly rich, and with extraordinary detail.

【178° Wide Viewing Angle】Experience visuals from any vantage point with the 178° wide-angle design. Break free from narrow viewing constraints. The three-sided narrow bezel design increases display area and allows for a virtually seamless multi-monitor setup, reducing your workflow and increasing productivity. Blue light filtering function effectively reduces eye fatigue, providing you with a comfortable and eye-protecting viewing experience whether you are working or entertaining.

【Multiple Scenario Connections】The 22-inch desktop monitors are equipped with HDMI 1.4 and VGA ports, enabling easy connections to a variety of devices, such as laptops, desktops, Xbox, PS4/5, Switch, etc. Switch effortlessly between office tasks, study sessions, and gaming. Additionally, it supports 75x75mm wall-mounted installation, providing practical space management and enhancing the aesthetics of your setup.
【Reliable Services】We provide high-quality computer monitors and premium services. We are dedicated to serving you and solving all your problems.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CRUA White Monitor-Vivid Realism CRUA White Computer Monitors boast a 95% sRGB gamut for authentic color reproduction. With 8-bit depth, transitions are finer, enhancing image quality. Supporting 16.7 million colors, it offers an immersive, lifelike display with meticulous attention to detail.

75Hz Monitor Enjoy seamless motion with a 75Hz refresh rate for smooth visuals during video watching and gaming, paired with a 5ms response time that minimizes image ghosting and blur, ensuring clear and defined images, especially in fast-paced scenes.

Immersive Space Three-sided narrow bezel pc monitor minimizes distractions and offering a wide view. Enable seamless multi-screen setups for enhanced workspace efficiency. Supports wall mounting, space-saving layout. 178° Wide View Enjoy a stable, wide visual experience at 178°, ensuring color accuracy, accommodating multiple users, allowing flexible placement, and reducing eye strain. Angle Adjustment The 22'' monitor supports -5° to 15° angle adjustment, you can adjust the most comfortable angle according to your needs, reduce fatigue and increase work comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excelent monitor, Hidden gem
reviews.reviewText: I was a bit worried since the 1440p 144hz version did not have any reviews yet but I was amazed at how good this monitor is, absolutely one of the best monitors for the price, considering this is in the price range of most 1080p 144/165hz monitors but this one is actually 1440p.I didn't know how much better 1440p was until I selected the resolution in a game and was blown away by how much more I could actually see, although, unfortunately, my PC can only do either high refresh rate or high resolution in most triple A games, and I can only experience both when I'm playing Valorant or Rocket league or similar light games, but regardless, the color and response time are amazing as well. The screen gets plenty bright and I only ever need to turn it up to 100% brightness when the sun hits it directly and I'm watching low light content, like when it is nigh time in-game or similar situations, and I generally keep it at 20-50% brightness during the day and 0-10% at night.Mine came very well packaged and as far as I know, it has no dead pixels in the month or so that I've had it for. Excelent monitor overall, specially for the $199 price tag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gaming monitor for a lower price point
reviews.reviewText: I got this monitor since I had already splurged on 2 LG monitors for 300+ each and wanted to save some money on a work setup. This monitor is a quality screen for a lower price point and does an amazing job.Only thing to point out was: initially I was worried that there was some burn-in on the monitor. However, I reached out to support and they quickly responded to me saying that I had left the dust film on the monitor. So don't be a dummy like me and stress over marks on the screen and double check that you had removed the dust film!I wasn't expecting good support of this monitor, but the company did a great job quickly getting back to me on my support request, so plus sign for that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for gaming & pictures but not the best of text and office use.
reviews.reviewText: I REALLY liked this monitor and want to keep it, however text on the screen seems to be blurry. I can't go more than an hour on this monitor without getting a headache. I've tried spending roughly 3 hours changing the monitor settings as well as windows settings to get the text crisper similar to my 1080p monitor. I've reached out to support (email on, no website) and waiting for a response. I'll update once I hear back.Update:Support got back to me via email within roughly 48 hours. Unforntately, my eyes couldn't adjust and I had to return the monitor. I use my monitor 90% business/reading and 10% gaming. The gaming aspect was great, no headaches but the reading and business portion really hurt my eyes, most likely due to the vibrant (this sounds like a fake review setence...) colors and bright monitor. Sad to have to send it back though.I went for their 27" curved VA monitor instead of the IPS and other than the first day, I haven't had any headaches or eye strain while reading or handling business. I believe this is due to the VA monitor having a higher contrast ratio that makes the text appear sharper, that just my opinion, I'm not a monitor exquisidair.Based on support and the above I'm changing my review to 5 stars because if I purchased this only for gaming it would be perfect. I can noticably see the difference in speed and color when comparing the VA & IPS monitors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars arrived fine, but after an hour it became defective
reviews.reviewText: Well in all honesty, for the first hour, it was a great monitor haha. Unfortunately after that hour, I noticed the bottom half of the screen started to flicker, than out of nowhere the bottom half just started showing white lines horizontally across everything. I tried all the basic stuff, different display port cable, turning it off and on, unplugging it, plugging it back in. I know the monitor itself is defective because when you turn it on, the whole screen is purple with their logo in the center. But the white lines were still present on their logo screen. But to their credit, i think this may have been an amazon issue. When it arrived, its in its normal box, but typical amazon protocol, that box was in a bigger amazon box. But it was in that amazon box with no packing material like foam, the bubbles, or those bags of air. So I guess it is possible it got damaged in shipping, seeing as the amazon box was not packaged well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. When i was looking for a 27 inch, 1440p 144Hz monitor, this CRUA monitor showed up as the lowest priced option at 189.99. And so far, it’s worked great! The picture is very clear and colorful, and it’s fairly easy to set up. I had trouble displaying my laptop on it, but the support team advised me to buy a usb to HDMI adapter, which solved the problem! Here’s a warning for putting the stand on: there is a square hole in the back of the monitor, so there’s a chance that a screw could fall into it if you’re not careful. That’s why happened to me, and while it’s obviously my fault, i’m just slightly worried about what might happen in the future due to a foreign piece of metal in the monitor. If you’re careful though, unlike me, you should be just fine. All in all, at 189.99, i think this monitor is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Monitors for gaming
reviews.reviewText: The monitors are very easy to assemble. Surprisingly sturdy despite taking very little space for the stands. Stands are metal and feel durable. Picture quality is great for gaming, the 144hz refresh rate looks really good. Personally I like small bezels, and these are pretty much perfect for my tastes. 1440p is very useful if you use multiple programs on 1 monitor.Overall, a fantastic buy for the price.

reviews.reviewerName: Saulo Julián Saavedra LópezSaulo Julián Saavedra López
reviews.reviewText: Cumplió con mis expectativas, tiene todo lo que prometeÚnicamente que me llego con un pequeño detalle que no se a que se deba y es que parece que no está bien cerrada la pantalla de la parte inferior
